product_name: Columbia PFG Pacifica Polarized Sunglasses - Special Buy
long_description: Whether you're headed for the beach or for powder-covered slopes, the PFG Pacifica Polarized Sunglasses from Columbia keep your view sharp and clear thanks to glare-reducing polarized lenses. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Durable thermoplastic polyamide frames feature strategically placed vents to increase airflow and reduce fogging and condensation. Adjustable nosepads and temple tips become tacky when damp, keeping sunglasses in place even if wet or sweaty; temple tips are flat to fit smoothly under hats or helmets. Special buy.
